title: Looking for a couple of items
author: w600

posts.post_title: Looking for a couple of items
posts.post_content:
1908 Rose Company Walter Johnson
1931 Harrison Studio Josh Gibson

Please delete and put this in the BST section.  The main board is for discussion, not want lists.  Thanks

And BTW, I am an active competitor for a W600 Wajo  :p
Those are two near impossible rookie cards. Good luck with your search and post them if you are ever able to add them to your collection.

[quote name="Rhotchkiss" post=2143863]Please delete and put this in the BST section.  The main board is for discussion, not want lists.  Thanks

And BTW, I am an active competitor for a W600 Wajo  :p[/QUOTE]

Ummmm +1 and wasn’t w600 the late Jerry Spillman user ID from here?

[quote name="BeanTown" post=2144558]Ummmm +1 and wasn’t w600 the late Jerry Spillman user ID from here?[/QUOTE]

Jerry Spillman's ID was "jerrys" here.

Wouldn't a W600 Walter Johnson be an awesome card?

Put me next in line for a 1931 Harrison Studios RPPC of Josh Gibson.

Both great cards.

Good luck with the hunt.

Poster Jay Cee referred to Jerry Spillman as  "The Late...".  I may have missed some post in the past but has the collecting community, and beyond, lost Mr. Spillman ?  I know him from a lengthy conversation we had about 30 years ago regarding W600 cards.  He was very kind and generous with his time and sharing his personal complete checklist he mailed to me.  Mothing but good things to say about Jerry.
Yes, Jerry passed away in late 2020.
